description:
This is a market on daily trade volume for the Opensea NFT marketplace according to DappRadar: https://dappradar.com/multichain/marketplaces/opensea. The "Volume" chart data under "Historical activity" will be used as this market's resolution source.

If for any day within this market's timeframe the resolution source reports a daily volume lower than $20.00M, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, when the daily data for every day within this market's timeframe are available, and on every day the volume is $20.00M or higher, this market will resolve to "No". 

If all of the relevant data are not available by June 22 (11 PM ET), and the "Yes" conditions have not been met, this market will resolve to "No".

Data checks performed on a relevant data point within this market’s timeframe must be conducted after that data point is finalized for the check to be valid to resolve this market.

This market's timeframe spans May 24 to June 15 (inclusive).

markets.question: Will daily volume on Opensea drop below $20M by June 15?

title: Will daily volume on Opensea drop below $20M by June 15?
